title: Our Impact | Reliance Industries Limited
description: At Reliance, we are constantly aligning our ambitions with India’s dreams by generating employment, immense societal value, committed resources and ideas to a digital revolution, creating world-class manufacturing assets that produce clean fuels and materials of the future, and building a consumer-focused, integrated retail ecosystem
keywords: Reliance Industries, digital revolution, generating employment, retail ecosystem
og:title: Reliance Industries Limited – Retail Markets | Telecom | Petroleum Refining & Marketing | Petrochemicals | Hydrocarbon Exploration & Production | Jio 4G | Reliance Shares
og:description: Reliance Industries Limited is committed to innovation-led, exponential growth in the areas of hydrocarbon exploration and production, petroleum refining and marketing, petrochemicals, retail and telecommunications.
